root.title: quak damag chuquicamata mine spokesman
root.body: earthquak hit northern chile todai regist 7.0 open end richter scale caus damag copper mine chuquicamata mine spokesman sai chuquicamata public relat director guillermo barcelo tell reuter telephon mine quak caus problem oper continu usual spokesman state chilean copper commiss santiago confirm damag chuquicamata
